# Disguise Caravan (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a tiny replica of a wagon)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One vehicle (and any animals pulling it)

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

You cloak a vehicle (and any animals pulling it) in illusion, making it appear as another type of vehicle (possibly with completely different animals) of your choice. You can choose what it appears as down to small details such as what carvings it bears. You can make the vehicle to be any other land-going vessel, though it cannot seem to be more than 50% smaller or larger.

Creatures within the area are not hidden or changed in appearance, nor are their possessions.
